13.content:
Out of the blue, three red, serpent-like monsters charged out of the woods and towards Johann. They were fast and moved in and out of the ground in a wave sort of pattern. However, they were no match for Johann's magic, as his hands emitted a force that repelled some of the light from his hands. One could say they were glowing black. Whatever the case, the darkness formed into some claws that neatly rested at his finger tips. He scratched at on Grada, while another moved into the darknessed that lingered momentarily from the scratch, hurting it and making flee. The other Grada followed suit.
However, the fun wasn't over. More monsters came, three robe wearing, ghostlike creatures, one of them wearing blue, two wearing red, and what looked to be a cupid. She wore a toga that went down to her waist, a fluffy, thick, pink cloth diaper with a red heart, and had a pink quiver, which held the bows that would be going into Johann's head in a few seconds if he keeps standing around. Great, Light, he thought, the elemental advantage over me. The blue Roesi and one of the reds attempt a team-attack. The blue aimed carefully at Johann and hit him with a blue flame. The red followed up with a fireball, creating an attack similar to Antibode from Chrono Trigger [Those Roesies were later sued by Square Enix]. Though hurt, Johann had a trick up his own sleeve. He put his hands to the ground and suddenly, four spikes of darkness shot out to try and impale their targets. The Roesies vaporized into money, while the Cupid dodged and counter-attacked with a sleep arrow. Johann moved to the left, but hadn't anticipated the Cupid's multishot.
As drowsiness slowly took over, the Cupid landed in front of him and smirked. Then came darkness.

When Johann awoke, he found himself in a bed, with the Cupid standing next to him. He got his shadow claws ready, but the Cupid assured him that she meant no harm. "I gotta say, you seem pretty tough." Johann blushed slightly, "O-oh, that? Please, I-I could do better."The Cupid giggled at his flustered face, "Well, I'd like to maximize my potential too," she said "So I've been thinking about tagging along with you." Johann seemed surprised, "Really?" "Yup," the Cupid said confidently, "On one condition: You're wearing diapers too. I don't want to be the only incontinent one in the group." Her offer seemed reasonable, and it wouldn't hurt to actually have a companion of sorts.
13.title: Random Encounter [Shwaaa]

choices: the demon challenges Johann to a fight (the winner get whatever they want)
she tricks Johann into signing over himself as her personal pet/slave
she tries to kill Johann (but he's immortal so it's tricky)
she casts a spell on Johann that'll allow her to control him
14.content:
Did I say hole? I meant a mineshaft, One that was about 30 feet deep. And he free fell all the way down until his body hit the ground with a loud "THUMP!!!!"

His body layed on the floor, most of his bones were broken and his limbs mangeled. Johann's bones began cracking and popping into place and he began to reasemble himself. After most of him was repaired he stood up, swaying a bit from either disorentation or that some of his bones were still broken, but maintained his balance after all of that. Johann looks straight up and whistles to himself.

"Damn, did that suck." he muttered as he cracked his knuckles and his neck. He was about ot cast a spell that would allow him to float back up when sinister laughter was heard.

He turns his attention to the sorce of the laughter to find nothing but darkness from the tunnel. Suddenly, a woman emerged from the shadows, her hair was as red as burning embers, bronze skin, deep pools of purple for eyes, and sligtly demonic batwings sprouted from her back, she was wearing black armor though it was more revealing than armor should be. Judging from the demonic armor and wings, the lustful body she's practically putting on display, it was safe to bet that the woman was a Succubus or some other kind of demon.

"It's been awhile since a mortal's been here, let alone one that survived such a great fall..." the succubus said. For some strange reason, Johann wasn't afraid of the demon; even though it's prey were usually men and had a tendincy to devore them body and soul.

"I'm not really much of a mortal," Johann stated in a calm tone, perhaps to calm for the situation.

The demon licked her lips suductively, she nearly stood a whole foot taller than Johann -who was about 5' 6''- she flew closer to him but he stood his ground. In a flash of blinding light she jabbed her hand into Johann's chest and pulled out a ghostly version of the young man, but something was off. she noticed that chans were linked to his body and soul. The succubus merely shrugged this off as a minor inconvinence and attempted to cut the chains but to no avail.

JoHann's soul began to retract to its body. causing him to gasp for air.

"GOD DAMMIT!!!" he swore loudly, "I hate it when that happnes!!!"

The succubus didn't know what shocked her more, the fact that she could not pull out and consume this mortal's soul, or that he had experianced this before.

Johann out streched his hand and a sword materialized in his hand, he took up a poor fighting pose in a foolish attempt to look menacing to the demoness.

Something about this mortal intriged the demon, only causing her to want Johann even more then she would for any run of the mill human.
14.title: he fell down a hole

142.content:
The demon decided a bit of acting was in order. She dropped to the floor and began to fake sob.
"I... don't... know... how... fight. Please... don't hurt me!"
She looked at him with pleading eyes and smirked inwardly when the sword disappeared. Hook. Line. Sinker.
She looked at him with fearful eyes. "Please, go away. Sign this saying you wont come back." She whimpers for extra effect as her hand holding the sheet of paper and pen shakes slightly.
He takes the sheet and pen from her trying to look as non-threatening as possible which made the demon think that he was cute for trying.
Right after he signed his clothes began to change. His underwear became a thickly padded diaper and his clothes turned into a fluffy red onsie.
He was about to drop to the floor but the demon caught him.
"I was going to make you my slave but you looked so cute earlier I decided you can be my baby from now on. You say you're immortal which means we have all the time in the world."
142.title: she tricks Johann into signing over himself as ...

choices: She flies to a house in the middle of the forest
She opens a portal to Hell and takes her new pet to her castle
1421.content:
"How did you know I was immortal?" Johann asked as matching red mittens and booties appeared on his hands and feet.

"It was easy," answered the succubus, "your soul refused to leave your body and you survived a 30 ft drop," at that moment a collar appeared and suppressed his magic.

Johann tried to force magic out, trying to create a shield and sword; sadly all that happens was a rattle and plush kitty appeared in his arms. That a trinkiling sound from his diaper, causing his face to turn red in shame.

The succubus looked over the contract and saw the name, "Johann? How ironic, seeing that you name means 'gracious to god'," she smiles as she cradled her new baby slave with and with a mighty flap of her demonic wings the demoness flew out of the hole Johann fell through and straight into the sky. "My name is Lillian by the way, but you will address me as mistress," she flashed a grin, "or mommy."

Johann clings onto his mistress out of fear of slipping and falling to a hard and unforgiving ground. He finally finds his voice after the shock of being babified by Lillian's magic "Where are you tak-MMPH!!!" A pacifier was the next thing to appear and forced him to suckle on it without his consent.

"Why I'm taking you home with me of course,"
1421.title: Continue

14211.content:
She began to descend from the sky and landed near a normal, simple house. It was kind of disappointing, Johann was expecting something cooler. Lillian started walking toward the home with Johann in her arms, cradling her now oversized toddler.

"Underwhelming, isn't it?" She asked, waiting for a response from her new slave. All Johann could do was nod absentmindedly. "Don't worry cutie, there's no fire and brimstone inside. Just a normal looking house in the woods, the resident aren't as normal though."

With just a wave of her unoccupied had, the door opened itself for its owner. Again, nothing out of the ordinary here. The door lead straight to the living room which connected to the kitchen/dining room. There was everything anyone would expect from a living room; tv, a game console that doubled as a movie player and other entertainment systems, sofas, and a few lamps. What caught his eyes were the adult sized playpen that had a few toys laying in there.

Lillian then placed Johann in the playpen. Using this opportunity to stand and maybe try to escape, he immediately stood up... Only to fall on his bottom, causing his diaper to crinkle. The succubus couldn't help but giggle at his failed attempt, it wasn't cruel or mocking laughter, just amusement.

"Sorry slave, but the contract that you signed makes me the owner of your body, since I couldn't get your soul. So that means I make all the decisions, and I decided that you can't walk. Oh and before I forget to mention it; I also decided that you aren't potty trained." Johann looked up with a shocked expresion on his face. "That's right," she answered in a singsong voice, "you're just like a big baby."
14211.title: She flies to a house in the middle of the forest

142111.content:
You realise now just how utterly hopeless and helpless your situation really is, and begin to cry like a baby in front of your new captor.

"Awwe," she coos, "There, there, Sweetie. Don't cry, poor baby. Mommy knows how to make baby feel better."

She then sits down on the couch and removes her top, revealing a glorious pair of bossoms. "Now then, come here to Mamma, "
She says, before snapping her fingers. Still crying behind your pacifier, you find yourself floating across the room towards her, right into her lap. After you come to rest on her lap, she reaches around and grabs the back of your head. With her other hand, she pulls out your pacifier, before pulling your head to her waiting nipple. You soon stop crying, and begin to enjoy yourself, especially as her free hand begins rubbing your erection through the diaper.

"Well," she giggles, "I must confess: not EVERYTHING is just let a baby...I shall have a different kind of fun with this, later, "she says, giving it a firm squeeze, "But for now, let mommy make Baby feel good."

Then, as you continue suckling, she rubs you off in your diapers, making you explode with pleasure as you scream a muffled cry into her breast.

"Good boy," she coos, "but you still need to finish the other breast."

She switches you over to the other side, and after suckling for a few more minutes, you grow drowsy and fall asleep. When you wake up, you are:
142111.title: Crybaby Jouhan

15.content:
Okay, let's try a little variety with this. Here are some story ideas.

1. This one takes place on a spaceship with my character Shrodringer, a medic.

2. This story stars Jacob Walker, a cyborg from a colony on ankther planet.

3. Is an M/M pairing so go wild.
15.title: Alternate Universe!

choices: a nursery while she finds Johann's mommy/daddy.
To an adoption center for the poor baby to find a home.
to her car, she's taking him home!
151.content:
reference pic of Medic Johann Shrodringer: http://sta.sh/024mwahty9sz
~~~~~~~~~~~

Johann sat as comfortable as he could in his seat on board a commercial spaceship on it's way to a new colony. It was still developing and it had new jobs just waiting for people to show up and get them. The only downside, as far as Johann was concerned, was that half of the population wore diapers and he drew the short straw. He groaned out of annoyance when he moved and caused his first of many diapers he would be wearing while living at the colony, nicknamed "Rebirth" by outsiders.

In front of him was a diaper bag, just for him that was given to him when he first boarded the ship and was diapered by a stewardess, very awkward for him and he even got a pacifier for 'being such a good boy'. He opened his bag and took a peek inside; finding diapers (duh), powder, wipes, cream, spare clothing (obviously baby clothes), baby bottles, and a plushy owl?

"This is going to suck!" he thought to himself as the ship finally landed and it was time to get off. The usual voice spoke over the intercom telling everyone what to do and where to go, except one order was directed specifically directed to those wearing diapers.

"All padded citizen please remain on the ship until you are escorted by your adult." The announcer said as Johann noticed that the padded riders were being lead out by their hands by someone else. He tried to follow them out when he was stopped by the same stewardess who diapered him.

"Sorry little one, you need your caregiver to help you off the ship." She told him with a sweet and polite voice.

"I don't need one, I came on this ship on my own." He explained to the lady.

"I'm afraid that I can't let you wonder around on your own without proper supervision baby." She answered and before Johann could retort or complain, he was silence when she popped a spare pacifier into his mouth, being too big for the young man to spit out.

The stewardess leads Johann to ...
151.title: Johann Shrodringer, space medic.

1511.content:
The stewardess leads Johann off the ship and to a nursery at the shipping port. He looked around the place and saw what kind of society he would be living in. People were being babied all round him, changing tables, highchairs, strollers, and people being lead around by their hands with their diapers showing off. Once they were at their destination, the stewardess dropped off Johann at the nursery.

"Now you wait here sweetie, while we notify your caretaker here." The stewardess cooed at him, then she turned to the worker at the nursery. "Do you think you can get him something cuter? Someone will be bringing his luggage here."

"Sure, I'll get him set up." The caretaker said with a smile and picked up Johann and carried him to a changing table and removed his medic uniform. Johann tried to resist but was simply overpowered by the caretaker, who probably master dressing fussy babies. Once she was done, Johann was wearing a long sleeved shirt, a thicker diaper, mittens, stockings, and booties. "Now don't you look so adorable for your mommy or daddy." She cooed, she scooped him up and dropped him off in a playpen and handed him his plushy owl.

Johann folded his arms with annoyance and refused to touch any of the toys. after half an hour though, he got bored and caved in, he started to mess around with some of the toys. After half an hour, he was enjoying playing with the blocks and his new favorite owl plush. An hour later, the caretaker lead someone over to the playpen to pick up Johann and take them home.

who was it?
1511.title: a nursery while she finds Johann's mommy/da...

the story will begin with my dark artist character wandering in the forest, what happens from there on is up to you http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/021/8/e/neko_playtime_by_sweetmomopuffs-d...

things i will allow:
magic
mythology (magical creatures like faries)
anthro (i'm a cat person, but just giving him cat ears and a tail is okay to, he can turn into a full blown black cat)
mental/physical regression
forced
sissy-ness
gender bending
introduce your own characters
have other characters in diapers as long as johann is wearing them too
a combo of everything
Giantess

what I won't allow
Vore
weight gain
shrinking

Be sure to check this out for more diaper stories
